column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We each had a slice of deep dish pizza
column2: specifically par baked deep dish cheese pizza with a butter crust. The cheese was cheesy
column3: the crust was thick and bready
column4: and it was nice and hot. Apparently
column5: they use slices of cheese instead of shredded cheese. I loved the taste of really fresh tomatoes on the pizza! Our food tour guide said they don't use tomato sauce; they use crushed tomatoes.
